intermediateLanguage

Interface Instruction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinOpInstruction, BrInstruction, CallInstruction, LcInstruction, LdInstruction, RetInstruction, StInstruction

    public interface Instruction
    Interface for Instruction type

    • Method Summary

      Register getAssignedRegister()

      Replace the assigned register with a new register with the regnum of to
      void rewriteReferencedRegisters(Register from, Register to)
      Replace all registers with regnum matching from, with new registers with the regnum of to
